verses.text: \w And|strong="H0776"\w* Hiram king \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Tyre sent \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* heard \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* anointed \w him|strong="H0853"\w* king \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w room|strong="H5066"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* Hiram \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* Davidâ€™s friend.
\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* sent \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram, saying:

Thou knowest \w the|strong="H0905"\w* \w will|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* David my father, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* that \w he|strong="H1241"\w* could not build a house \w to|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* name \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* Lord his God, because \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H0905"\w* wars that \w were|strong="H6629"\w* round about him, until \w the|strong="H0905"\w* Lord put them under \w the|strong="H0905"\w* soles \w of|strong="H6629"\w* his feet.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God hath given \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* adversary nor evil occurrence.

Wherefore \w I|strong="H5704"\w* purpose \w to|strong="H5704"\w* build \w a|strong="H5704"\w* temple \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord spoke \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w David|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* father, saying: \w my|strong="H3605"\w* son, whom \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* throne \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy piece, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* build \w a|strong="H5704"\w* house \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* name.

\w Give|strong="H1961"\w* orders \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* thy servants cut \w me|strong="H1961"\w* down cedar trees \w out|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Libanus, \w and|strong="H0505"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* servants \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H8147"\w* thy servants: \w and|strong="H0505"\w* \w I|strong="H8147"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w the|strong="H1961"\w* hire \w of|strong="H8147"\w* thy servants whatsoever thou wilt ask, \w for|strong="H8010"\w* thou knowest how \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* among \w my|strong="H1961"\w* people \w a|strong="H1961"\w* man \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* skill \w to|strong="H1961"\w* hew wood \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Sidonians.

Now \w when|strong="H0376"\w* Hiram \w had|strong="H8010"\w* heard \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* rejoiced exceedingly, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: Blessed \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hath given \w to|strong="H0413"\w* David \w a|strong="H3808"\w* very wise son \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H0428"\w* numerous \w people|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Hiram sent \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Solomon, saying: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* heard \w all|strong="H0376"\w* thou hast desired \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* thy desire \w concerning|strong="H0413"\w* cedar trees, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* fir trees.

\w My|strong="H5414"\w* servants \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Libanus \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* floats \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w convey|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt signify \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* land \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thou shalt \w receive|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thou shalt \w allow|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* necessaries, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* furnish food \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* household.
So Hiram gave \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* cedar trees, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* fir trees, according \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* desire.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Solomon allowed Hiram twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H1121"\w* wheat, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* provision \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* house, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* twenty measures \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* purest oil: \w thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* Solomon \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Hiram \w every|strong="H3605"\w* year.

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* wisdom \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Solomon, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* peace between Hiram \w and|strong="H1696"\w* Solomon, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w they|strong="H1696"\w* two \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* league together.

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* Solomon chose workmen cut \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* levy \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* thirty thousand men.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* sent \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Libanus, ten thousand \w every|strong="H3605"\w* month \w by|strong="H0935"\w* turns, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* two months \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w home|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Adoniram \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w over|strong="H0853"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* levy.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* seventy thousand \w to|strong="H0413"\w* carry burdens, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* eighty thousand \w to|strong="H0413"\w* hew stones \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mountain:

Besides \w the|strong="H0559"\w* overseers \w who|strong="H0559"\w* were \w over|strong="H0413"\w* every work, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* number three thousand, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* three hundred \w that|strong="H0559"\w* ruled \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* people, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* did \w the|strong="H0559"\w* work.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king commanded, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* stones, costly stones, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* foundation \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* square \w them|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* masons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Solomon, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* masons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Hiram hewed \w them|strong="H5117"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Giblians prepared timber \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stones \w to|strong="H0369"\w* build \w the|strong="H3068"\w* house.
